article_title: House candidate Zinke touts leadership background

article_metadata.description: Speaking to the Montana Medical Association trustees here recently, House candidate Ryan Zinke wastes no time telling the doctors what he thinks will happen to the Affordable Care Act.
article_metadata.author:
CHARLES S. JOHNSON
IR State Bureau
